listings.Program Name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
listings.Program Description: Designed to meet the growing need for computer science experts, our Bachelor of Science in Computer Science degree is an essential tool for those looking to join this exciting field. The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSCS) is accredited by the Commission for Academic Accreditation of the United Arab Emirates Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research.
